short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly collect and organize prominent links from Google SERPs, enhancing your browsing and research efficiency.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your online research with SERP Link Harvester, the ultimate tool for streamlined web exploration! This extension not only swiftly gathers the top links from Google search results but also features a specialized 'site:' search function. With its unique ability to filter and organize relative links, it's perfect for researchers, students, and professionals seeking a more focused and efficient browsing experience. Say goodbye to manual link collection and embrace a smarter way to access and manage vital web resources. Install now and revolutionize the way you navigate and extract information from the web.
